msg: NakedObjectReflector, NakedObjectPersistor and NakedObjectConfiguration all injected via constructor or setter-based injection wherever possible (constructor preferred); the *PersistAlgorithm implementations are not consistent with respect to their treatment of aggregated objects.

author: dkhaywood
msg: NakedObjectReflector, NakedObjectPersistor and NakedObjectConfiguration all injected via constructor or setter-based injection wherever possible (constructor preferred); PersistorUtil and other utility classes no longer use singletons (instead have the NakedObjectPersistor passed in as a parameter); moved the listener and event firing stuff out of NakedObject/PojoAdapter and into EventFiring interface and EventFiringPojoAdapter
